title: Leaverbuster in bots?
body:
So recently I had to leave a game after my 20 minute leaverbuster was gone. So I panicked, thinking I would get permabanned. 
If you're someone like me with lots of school and stuff, and can only fit in 1-2 bot games a day, you'll know the pressure of 'do I queue?' or 'do I not queue' 
Most of the time I pick not queue, but one time I decided to queue. And that was a bad idea. Because 1. I was playing with 2 of my very very new friends that keep walking into towers. And 2. The other people were bots. So the game took longer than usual. Then I had to leave. 
What I'd like to have is no leaverbuster on bots. Because personally, I don't really care about people leaving on bots. 
Or you could add a gamemode that only lasts for 5-10 minutes.

replies.body: Go play beginner instead of intermediate bots then.  Last for around 10 minutes.
